titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the time during which air carrier liability for third party damages as a result of a terrorist attack may be limited, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/20/2002--Introduced. Amends Federal transportation law to extend, beginning on September 22, 2001 through December 31, 2003, the period of time during which air carrier liability for third party damages as a result of a terrorist act may be limited to no more than $100 million, in the aggregate, for all claims arising out of such act.
